Attributes.description: Fluid properties; statics; kinematics, dynamics, energy, and momentum principles for control volumes; dimensional analysis and similarity; laminar and turbulent flow; pipe flow; principles of centrifugal pumps.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: All of MATH 152, PHYS 170 and one of MATH 217, MATH 253; and either (a) PHYS 131 and one of PHYS 108, PHYS 118; or (b) PHYS 153 or (c) all of PHYS 157, PHYS 158, PHYS 159.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Fri, Start Time: 11:00, End Time: 12:00, Building: Forest, Room: Sciences
